name: libra_nodejs_grpc
description: Test gRPC Nodejs project w/ Libra protobufs
author: Jake Casaletto

scripts.test-libra-env-var: if [ -z $LIBRA ]; then echo "\$LIBRA environment variable missing."; echo "Please set \$LIBRA to the Libra Core root path"; exit 1; fi
scripts.setup: npm install && mkdir -p dist && npm run build
scripts.clean-protos: rm -rf src/proto/* && mkdir -p src/proto/flowtypes && mkdir -p src/proto/js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-protos && cp -a ./src/. ./dist/
scripts.copy-protos: npm run test-libra-env-var && echo "Copying Libra protobuf files..."; sourcedir=$(pwd); find $LIBRA -name "*.proto" -execdir echo "	Copying {}..." \; -execdir cp "{}" $sourcedir/src/proto \; -execdir sed -i '' 's#import "shared/#import "#g' $sourcedir/src/proto/{} \;
scripts.build-protos: npm run test-libra-env-var && npm run clean-protos && npm run copy-protos && echo "Building and Flow-typing Libra protobuf files..."; sourcedir=$(pwd); find ./src/proto -name "*.proto" -execdir protoc --plugin="protoc-gen-flow=$sourcedir/node_modules/.bin/protoc-gen-flow" --js_out="import_style=commonjs,binary:$sourcedir/src/proto/js" --flow_out="$sourcedir/src/proto/flowtypes"  -I$sourcedir/src/proto "{}"  \;
